CoinSpotDotNet

Class CoinSpotClient

A typed System.Net.Http.HttpClient that abstracts CoinSpot API v1 calls and handles request signing.

Constructors

| Improve this Doc View Source

CoinSpotClient(IOptionsMonitor<CoinSpotSettings>, ILogger<CoinSpotClient>, HttpClient)

Constructor. Requires a registered Microsoft.Extensions.Options.IOptions`1 where TOptions == CoinSpotSettings containing your CoinSpot API credentials

Declaration
public CoinSpotClient(IOptionsMonitor<CoinSpotSettings> options, ILogger<CoinSpotClient> logger, HttpClient client)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Microsoft.Extensions.Options.IOptionsMonitor<CoinSpotSettings> options

An Microsoft.Extensions.Options.IOptionsMonitor<TOptions> where TOptions == CoinSpotSettings
Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger<CoinSpotClient> logger

Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger<TCategoryName> for error logging
System.Net.Http.HttpClient client

The System.Net.Http.HttpClient injected by the ServiceProvider when registering this class with Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection.AddHttpClient<TInterface, TImplementation>()
